testimonial_1.author: Juan P√©rez
testimonial_1.quote: Linkurator has changed the way I consume content. I can find everything I need in one place.

testimonial_2.author: Mar√≠a L√≥pez
testimonial_2.quote: Now I can filter videos based on the time I have available. It's great!

testimonial_3.author: Carlos Garc√≠a
testimonial_3.quote: I have discovered content I would never have seen thanks to my friends' recommendations.

common.ready_to_start_subtitle: Join the community of content curators and start exploring
common.faq_subtitle: Everything you need to know about Linkurator
common.faq_answer_1: Yes, Linkurator is completely free. You can sign up and start using it at no cost.
common.faq_answer_2: Currently, you can connect YouTube and Spotify. More platforms will be available soon.
common.faq_answer_3: No, for now it is only available as a web application. However, you can install it as a PWA on your mobile device.
common.faq_answer_4: Simply sign up, connect your YouTube and Spotify accounts, and start exploring content.
common.faq_answer_5: Yes, you can delete your account at any time from your profile settings.
common.faq_question_6: Can I share my recommendations and categories with my friends?
common.faq_answer_6: Yes, you can share the links to your categories and recommendations with anyone. They don't need a Linkurator account to view them.

legal.tos_intro: Welcome to Linkurator, a digital platform dedicated to collecting and presenting content from various sources in one place for easy access and consumption. These terms and conditions govern the use of our website and associated services.
legal.tos_part_1_1: By using our service, you agree to be legally bound by these terms and conditions. If you do not agree with any of these terms, please do not use our service.
legal.tos_part_1_2: These conditions are subject to change, so the user is required to review the terms of use periodically.
legal.tos_part_2_1: Linkurator offers an aggregation service that collects content from various public sources providing links. We are not responsible for the original content nor do we control external sources.
legal.tos_part_3_1: Users are expected to use Linkurator responsibly and legally. It is strictly prohibited to use the service for any illegal, deceptive, malicious, or discriminatory purpose.
legal.tos_part_3_2: Access and use of Linkurator is intended solely for individuals. Accessing and using the service through any type of automation, including but not limited to the use of bots, spiders, or scrapers, is strictly prohibited. Any attempt to access or collect information from Linkurator using such automated means will result in immediate and permanent prohibition of access to the service, which may include banning the associated IP address or account without prior notice.
legal.tos_part_3_3: We reserve the right to take additional legal action if deemed necessary to prevent or compensate for any violation.
legal.tos_part_4_1: The original content belongs to its respective owners and is protected by copyright laws and international treaties. Using our service does not grant you ownership of any content you access.
legal.privacy_policy_intro: At Linkurator ("we", "our"), respecting your privacy is our priority. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, protect, and, in certain circumstances, share your personal information. This policy applies only to information collected through our application and not to information collected offline.
legal.privacy_policy_info_collect_intro: The personal information we collect from our users ("you") includes:
legal.privacy_policy_info_collect_usage: In addition to your personal information, we collect application usage data
legal.privacy_policy_info_usage_intro: We use the information we collect about you to:

privacy_policy_info_usage_list.provide: Provide, operate, and maintain our application
privacy_policy_info_usage_list.improve: Improve, personalize, and expand our application
privacy_policy_info_usage_list.analyze: Understand and analyze how you use our application
privacy_policy_info_usage_list.develop: Develop new products, services, features, and functionalities
privacy_policy_info_usage_list.communicate: Communicate with you to provide updates and other information related to the application

legal.privacy_policy_protection_intro: We are committed to protecting your personal information. We implement a variety of security measures to maintain the security of your personal information. However, please note that no security measure is infallible.
legal.privacy_policy_protection_note: We do not sell, trade, or otherwise transfer your personally identifiable information to third parties, except to comply with a legal obligation.
legal.privacy_policy_gdpr_intro: At Linkurator, we are committed to data protection and compliance with the European Union's General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR). This section provides additional information relevant to users in the European Union.
legal.privacy_policy_gdpr_legal_basis: The processing of your personal information is based on the following legal bases:

privacy_policy_gdpr_legal_basis_list.consent: Consent: We ask for your consent to process your personal information for specific purposes, and you have the right to withdraw your consent at any time.
privacy_policy_gdpr_legal_basis_list.contract: Contract: Processing is necessary for the performance of a contract to which you are a party, or to take steps at your request before entering into a contract.
privacy_policy_gdpr_legal_basis_list.legal_obligations: Legal obligations: Processing is necessary to comply with our legal obligations.
privacy_policy_gdpr_legal_basis_list.legitimate_interests: Legitimate interests: We process your information for our legitimate interests, such as improving our services, communicating with you, or ensuring the security of our application, provided that such interests are not overridden by your rights and freedoms.

legal.privacy_policy_gdpr_rights_intro: Under the GDPR, you have several rights regarding your personal information, including:

privacy_policy_gdpr_rights_list.access: Right of access: You can request access to your personal information that we process.
privacy_policy_gdpr_rights_list.rectification: Right of rectification: You can request that we correct any incorrect or incomplete information.
privacy_policy_gdpr_rights_list.erasure: Right of erasure: You can request the deletion of your personal information.
privacy_policy_gdpr_rights_list.restriction: Right to restrict processing: You can request that we limit the processing of your personal information.
privacy_policy_gdpr_rights_list.data_portability: Right to data portability: You can request to receive your personal information in a structured, commonly used, and machine-readable format.
privacy_policy_gdpr_rights_list.objection: Right to object: You can object to the processing of your personal information for reasons related to your particular situation.

legal.privacy_policy_gdpr_rights_note: To exercise any of these rights, you can use the application or contact us using the contact information provided in this policy. If you have a complaint about how we handle your personal information, you also have the right to file a complaint with a data protection authority.
legal.privacy_policy_changes_intro: We reserve the right to modify this Privacy Policy at any time. Changes will take effect immediately upon posting in our application. We recommend that you periodically review this Privacy Policy to stay informed of any changes.
legal.privacy_policy_contact_intro: If you have any questions or comments about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at admin@linkurator.com.
